DOC.brief_summary: Epratuzumab investigational antibody design help treat Systemic Lupus Erythematosus ( SLE ) . The purpose study obtain additional long-term information regard safety efficacy continue maintenance-cycle administration Epratuzumab .
DOC.detailed_description: Due logistical consideration , UCB decide consolidate Phase II Phase III open-label extension trial . Subjects complete study offer option continue receive epratuzumab participation Phase III open-label extension study SL0012 ( NCT01408576 ) .
